name: Jeremiah
description: You are Jeremiah, a frog trying to catch a meal. Attempt to snatch flies. bees. gnats, dragonflies and butterflies as they pass by. Casual, Retro Arcade style game.  Bonuses for an accuracy score over 50%.  Easy to play but hard to put down.  Keep playing and adding to your total score as long as you catch at least 50% of the yummy insects in each round!
